item.title: Multiple vulnerabilities at Craft CMS SEOmatic plugin
item.description: A couple of months ago I was performing retest of an interesting Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability at debug GET parameter. Developers disabled it on load balancer and I decided to perform some fuzzing with awesome Burp Suite plugin param-miner . There was no way to exploit SSRF but interesting parameter action was discovered. Future investigation show that it is default behavior of Craft CMS . Fast search by public CVE retured promising vulnerability CVE-2018-14716.
